products.title: Ritz Barrier Reef Vertical Blind
products.description: This vertical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being blackout, it is great for stopping any light from passing through the fabric - great for living rooms and bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Fuji Silk Samurai Steel Roller Blind
products.description: The fuji silk samurai steel roller blind is a great alternative to a traditional grey roller blind while achieving the same aesthetic, with its shot-silk effect giving the blind a more silver metallic feel, this blind is a great way to add some texture to your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind has a beautiful shot-silk effec running across the fabric - perfect for adding some textured style to your window.

products.description: The fuji silk snow roller blind will blend seamlessly into your interior with its gentle neutral cream colour, while also adding a gorgeous texture to your window with its silky fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Woven Teal Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Woven teal roller blind.

products.title: Piazza Modena Roller Blind
products.description: This unique design is perfect for kitchen and bathroom windows as it is 100% waterproof and blackout. The colour will not fade and being moisture resistant means it can be installed in bathrooms - guaranteed to add a splash of style. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower.
